zealotTalents.name: Enemies Within, Enemies Without
zealotTalents.description: Replenish 5% Toughness per second while within 5 meters of 3 enemies.

zealotTalents.name: Faith Restored
zealotTalents.description: +75% Toughness damage reduction on critical hit for 4 seconds.

zealotTalents.name: Purify In Blood
zealotTalents.description: Replenish 50% more Toughness on melee kills.

zealotTalents.name: Bloodletting
zealotTalents.description: +10% Melee Crit Chance for 3 seconds on Melee Hit against Bleeding Enemies. Melee Critical Hits apply Bleed.

zealotTalents.name: Punishment
zealotTalents.description: Attacks that Hit 3 or more enemies grant +30% Impact for 5 seconds. Stacks 5 times. At max stacks, gain Uninterruptible.

zealotTalents.name: Retribution
zealotTalents.description: 10% attack speed below 50% health. Bonus is doubled below 20% health.

zealotTalents.name: Holy Fervour
zealotTalents.description: +20% Power to allies in Coherency for 5 seconds. On gaining a stack of Martyrdom.

zealotTalents.name: Inspiring Excoriation
zealotTalents.description: Using Chastise The Wicked replenishes 20% Toughness to allies in Coherency.

zealotTalents.name: Faith Restores All
zealotTalents.description: After taking damage you regain 25% of the damage taken over 5 seconds.

zealotTalents.name: Holy Revenant
zealotTalents.description: When Until Death ends, you gain health based on the damage you dealt during Until Death. Melee damage dealt heals for twice the amount.

zealotTalents.name: Thy Wrath Be Swift
zealotTalents.description: You no longer get stunned by enemy melee attacks. When you take damage, gain +20% movement speed for 2 seconds.

zealotTalents.name: Emperor's Executioner
zealotTalents.description: Deal up to 25% increased ranged damage based on the proximity to the target.

zealotTalents.name: Rising Conviction
zealotTalents.description: +4% damage for 5 seconds on hit. Max stacks 5.

zealotTalents.name: Fury Of The Faithful
zealotTalents.description: +20% attack speed for 5 seconds on using Chastise The Wicked.

zealotTalents.name: Invocation Of Death
zealotTalents.description: Melee critical hits reduce the cooldown of Chastise The Wicked by 1.5 second.

zealotTalents.name: Purge The Wicked
zealotTalents.description: Chastise The Wicked now has two charges.
